name: Monster:Mega Evolution
description:
- you can capture and evolve over 386 monsters!
- lifelike monsters and characters
- explore the vast and open world with partners everywhere
- more than 40 hours of epic adventure
- fight and trade with friends on other devices through cross-platform multiplayer mode
- challenge other summoners to become the ultimate summoner master!

Do you have the ability to become a master summoner?
